dct_description_sm: from the trigonometrical survey under the direction of A.D. Bache Superintendant ; engr[ave]d by E.H. Sipe, F.W. Benner and W.A. Thompson ; red[uce]d dr[awi]ng by F. Fairfax and L. Karcher.
Depths shown by soundings in feet.
"Triangulation by E. Blunt Asst., Topography by A.M. Harrison, Hydrography by the party under the direction of W.P. Trowbridge, Assit.
Includes notes on tides and elevations.
"Variation of the magnetic needle (computed) in Dec. 1882."
